title: betnomi

content: Guys, it's me again! This is the fourth round of six due to which the custom cold wallet will find its new owner.This RAFFLE is dedicated to the annual "Bitcointalk Community Awards" event where Betnomi was invited to be a sponsor! Good luck everyone! ü¶äFree shipping!I will announce the block number when we are full.Your forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year.We may, at our discretion, ignore applies (including inactive posters, etc).How this will work:Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Can take two slots if you voted in the topic Bitcointalk Community Awards üèÜAfter I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.00 - xandry01 - Markzellers02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - Suzuki Matt04 - Fattcatt05 - Darker4506 - TopTort77707 - QuakerBull08 - Buchi-8809 - DirtyBirdE10 - Hotdog711 - notblox112 - julerz1213 - HeRetiK14 - mole081515 - salad daging16 - bitbollo17 - joker_josue18 - rat03gopoh19 - inthelongrun20 - Bullion-n-BTC21 - mx12.levins22 - Frank AlpenCoin23 - hopenotlate24 - Coin_trader25 - Coin_trader26 - MrMojoRising2627 - krogoth28 - Pmalek29 - Woodie30 - montreal131 - CARIBBEAN TREASURES32 - dlightag33 - bullrun2020bro34 - examplens35 - Getmon36 - -doubleU-37 - PreciousMetapsICT38 - m201739 - Fundamentals Of40 - Woodie41 - cygan42 - tweetious43 - cygan44 - 45 - examplens46 - NeuroticFish47 - 48 - NeuroticFish49 - aoluain50 - minerjones51 - Ratimov52 - digicoinuser53 - m201754 - PeakDK55 - 5tift56 - ajiz13857 - rat03gopoh58 - ajiz13859 - bestcoin_5960 - salad daging61 - 62 - F2b63 - Steeley64 - wwzsocki65 - Mauser66 - soonandwaite67 - busminer68 - dark123469 - madnessteat70 - sunny71 - Real-Duke72 - 73 - Renampun74 - FinneysTrueVision75 - Inwestour76 - moparminingllc77 - Amax1678 - dark123479 - PawGo80 - Mauser81 - CoinageMint82 - Dernoste83 - haloxon84 - Koal-8485 - tread9386 - Remsjack87 - HouseOfBAMF88 - Mbitr89 - notblox190 - nara189291 - Cryptogreatdane92 - Dustin westerbeck93 - Yoda94 - Streissi95 - hyudien96 - JanEmil97 - Doblezero98 - JanEmil99 - willi9974Please let me know if the raffle rules need to be improved ü¶äNote:Quote
